name: Dental Madness: Cavity Mania
description:
Drill away cavity decay on Toothy Chompy Guys by coordinating the movement of the dental drill and mirror.

Dental Madness: Cavity Mania includes three tutorials. The Drill Tutorial focuses on moving and rotating the dental drill, then activating the drill to eliminate cavity decay. The Mirror Tutorial teaches players how to move and rotate the dental mirror in order to spot hidden cavities. The Full Tutorial combines dental drill and mirror tasks. There are ten gameplay Levels in DM:CM that challenge the players to eliminate cavity decay locations while under a time limit. Additionally, a monetary system rewards players for eliminating cavity decay and punishes players for going over time or drilling in the wrong location. Players that complete a Level especially quickly or profitably can enter their name and make the Top Ten Leaderboard for their instance of the game. DM:CM also includes a Main Menu, Options, Pause Menu and Credits.
